alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Iberia, northeastern St. Mary and southeastern St. Martin Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayou Sorrel, or 8 miles south of Plaquemine, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Franklin, Patterson, Berwick, Bayou Vista, Stephensville, Baldwin, Loreauville, Patterson Memorial Airport, Amelia, Bayou Geneve, Lake Fausse Pointe, Charenton, and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary
